Module.Name: Consumer product concentrations
Module.Description: Consumer product concentration (distributions) data are analytical measurements of chemical substances occurring in PCPs. In their simplest form, concentration data can just be used as provided by datasets.
Module.ShortDescription: Consumer product concentration (distributions) data are analytical measurements of chemical substances occurring in consumer products.
Module.DataDescription: Consumer product concentration (distributions) data can be entered using the internal, relational data format.
